en.CHATBOT_OPTIONS:CARD_TITLE: What would you like to do?
en.CHATBOT_OPTIONS:SUBTITLE_CREATE_TICKET: Create a ticket for a problem you are experiencing.
en.CHATBOT_OPTIONS:SUBTITLE_TICKET_STATUS: Check the status of a ticket you have already created.
en.CHATBOT_OPTIONS:SUBTITLE_TALK_TO_AGENT: Talk to an agent to get help with your problem.
en.CREATE_TICKET_OPTIONS:CARD_TITLE: What type of ticket would you like to create?
en.CREATE_TICKET_OPTIONS:SUBTITLE_SUPPORT_T: Create a ticket for a problem you are experiencing.
en.CREATE_TICKET_OPTIONS:SUBTITLE_ORDER_TIC: Create a ticket for an order you have placed.
en.CREATE_TICKET_OPTIONS:SUBTITLE_ENHANCEME: Create a ticket for an enhancement you would like to see.
en.CREATE_TICKET_MESSAGES:ELICIT_TITLE_MESS: Introduce the title of the ticket
en.CREATE_TICKET_MESSAGES:ELICIT_DESCRIPTIO: Introduce the description of the ticket
en.CONTINUE_CHATBOT_MESSAGES:CARD_TITLE: Do you want to continue in the chatbot?
